price: 36. Koros addunyal abak sugte umaaneenaa kee dambittel galtimtee? Yeey, dudda Íe galtoh galtimte.
arabic: هَلۡ ثُوِّبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: hal thuwwiba al-kufāru mā kānū yafʿalūna
